implode

public static StringBuilder implode(String delimiter,
                                    NodeList nodeList,
                                    StringBuilder stringBuilder)
Concatenates each item of the given nodeList with a given delimiter.

The values which are used as String-representations are the node values which can be obtained via org.w3c.dom.getNodeValue().

Parameters:
delimiter - The delimiter to use between node values (e.g. ", ").
nodeList -
stringBuilder - A StringBuilder on which to append the imploded string on.
Returns:
The same stringBuilder as given via the third parameter.
Since:
Iteration4

implode

public static String implode(String delimiter,
                             Object[] strings)
Concatenates each item of the given nodeList with a given delimiter.

The values which are used as String-representations are the node values which can be obtained via org.w3c.dom.getNodeValue().

Equivalent to calling implode(delimiter, strings, new StringBuilder()).toString().

Parameters:
delimiter - The delimiter to use between node values (e.g. ", ").
strings -
Returns:
Since:
Iteration4
